channel.title: Image Classification on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in Image Classification on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: CLS-RL: Image Classification with Rule-Based Reinforcement Learning
item.description: CLS-RL: Rule-based RL tackles catastrophic forgetting in MLLM image classification, outperforming SFT with better generalization and efficiency.

item.title: Scaling Laws in Patchification: An Image Is Worth 50,176 Tokens And More
item.description: Smaller image patches improve vision transformer performance, defying conventional wisdom and revealing a new scaling law for enhanced visual understanding.

item.title: iFormer: Integrating ConvNet and Transformer for Mobile Application
item.description: iFormer: A new family of mobile hybrid vision networks that expertly blends ConvNeXt’s fast local feature extraction with the efficient global modeling of self-attention, achieving top-tier accuracy a…

item.title: MLLM-as-a-Judge for Image Safety without Human Labeling
item.description: Zero-shot image safety judgment is achieved using MLLMs and a novel method called CLUE, objectifying safety rules, and significantly reducing the need for human labeling.

item.title: Learned Compression for Compressed Learning
item.description: WaLLOC: a novel neural codec boosts compressed-domain learning by combining wavelet transforms with asymmetric autoencoders, achieving high compression ratios with minimal computation and uniform dime…

item.title: EMOv2: Pushing 5M Vision Model Frontier
item.description: EMOv2 achieves state-of-the-art performance in various vision tasks using a novel Meta Mobile Block, pushing the 5M parameter lightweight model frontier.
